description: This file contains functions to extract and format version information from a provided dictionary 'info'. It provides GetVersion to parse version data, and GetVersionString to produce a version string.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the version as a list of three integers (major, minor, patch) from the 'info' dictionary. Handles versions stored as a list or string, with fallback defaults.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by utilizing GetVersion.
